snippet: Citing his role in forestalling an attack on Syria, a Russian advocacy group says their president deserves it as much as a certain other president.
abstract: Russian advocacy group International Academy of Spiritual Unity and Cooperation of Peoples of the World nominates Pres Vladimir V Putin for Nobel Peace Prize; group says Putin is more deserving of prize than Pres Barack Obama, who received it in 2009 but has continued to lead American military operations that have killed civilians abroad.
lead_paragraph: Citing his role in forestalling an attack on Syria, a Russian advocacy group says their president deserves it as much as a certain other president.

headline.main: Citing Efforts to Prevent Attack on Syria, Group Nominates Putin for Peace Prize
headline.print_headline: Citing Efforts to Prevent Attack on Syria, Group Nominates Putin for Peace Prize
